extension.summary: Play video and audio podcasts from 4d.rtvslo.si
Predvaja video in avdio vsebine podcastov 4d.rtvslo.si
extension.description: RTV Slovenia is a national radio and television public broadcast organization. With this plugin you can watch both video and audio podcasts published on their website.
RTV Slovenija je javna državna radiotelevizijska organizacija. S tem vtičnikom si lahko ogledate vse televizijske in radijske posnetke oddaj (podcaste), ki so objavljeni na njihovi spletni strani.
